attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Generate Cisco IOS XR 7.0.1 telemetry model-driven configuration for platform inventory + hardware state (FRU inventory entities + operational status). Use gRPC with no TLS. Server 192.0.2.124 port 57500. Use a 2-minute sample interval."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
"telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group PLATFORM-HW-STATE
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-plat-chas-invmgr-oper:platform-inventory/fru
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-plat-chas-invmgr-oper:platform-hardware-state/fru-oper-status
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.124
    port 57500
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-PLATFORM-HW-STATE
  sensor-group-id PLATFORM-HW-STATE sample-interval 120000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"
